website_summaries.verdict: Ideal if affordability is your top concern, though you may want to consider others for larger shoes made from difficult to stretch, tough materials.
cons: Some users didn't notice much difference after using it

customer_reviews.title: Great product that does the job right!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I get specialized shoes for diabetics that I always need stretched out professionally. Well, I got new shoes but in sickness forgot to have them stretched and kept them in my closet for a year. My daughter suggested I try to stretch them on my own. So, upon searching I bought this product, and followed it's directions. It was so easy to use! Keep in mind I am disabled, and I still found it easy to use. I did everything it said, and it worked perfectly to stretch out my shoes! So now I get to wear my new shoes comfortably. I'm so happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Castell

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn’t great, but does the trick for isolated stretching
customer_reviews.text: The price on these are great, but you really do sacrifice quality. These don’t expand all the way open, instead, when they’re put under pressure, they start to make concerning noises and begin to reverse. This, obviously, defeats the purpose, as you’re using them to stretch a shoe, which means they should be able to endure the weight and pressure of stretching leather. Nevertheless, they did work to a degree, specifically on the toe portion. The inserts for the toes are super effective for isolated stretching, which was really what we needed. Overall, we were pretty satisfied with the end result, it just took more attempts than it would have with a higher quality stretcher.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product. After trying to use it. I placed this item in a wood burning stove after removing items that would not burn. I do give 1 star for the heat it provided me with. This is sold as one and that is all you get. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: At last, better fillting shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe stretcher performed as expected. I used it to stretch a women's size 6 1/2 tennis shoe (a mixture of suede and fabric) which were snug. The directions for using the product were clear - I did repeat the 2-way stretching process on each shoe (a total of 4 days) because I did not want to overstretch the shoes. I think the shoes are now a half size bigger. I contacted the seller bc my package did not contain the 4 bunion/corn plugs, and they were very quick to respond. I would buy products through this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: imausr

customer_reviews.title: Saved my day and my shrunk shoes, thanks!
customer_reviews.text: I washed my expensive Nike Flyknit shoes in hot water and they shrunk a lot. This little item restored the shape and stretched them in a couple hours. Very smart, and it saved me $300 (yes, i washed two pairs) Also i used it to widen my lever pumps, so much more comfy now The quality is not for comersial use, but for personal occasional use perfect for the money.
customer_reviews.author: YELENA S.

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: After two major foot operations it finally dawned on me that there may be a product like this. This works great in all of the shoes that I have tried so far. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: CMaynard

customer_reviews.title: Not just for men ...ladies, new strappy heels? Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I found some gorgeous Coach Sandal heels awhile back ...but I haven't worn them because they hurt. I know they'll be comfy when I break them in....but that's a big "when". Well, I bought this (one per order) and used them in one shoe one night and compared it the next day. The stretched shoe FELT broken in, but looked brand new. Now I've done it to the other shoe, and they feel great. While you can use this with traditional shoes, you can also use it with cute (but tight) sandal heels. So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great streatcher!
customer_reviews.text: I was little worried that the stretcher would be too cheap and not do it's job and I was wrong! This little gadget is a great deal and is really effective! It comes with little plastic balls that you can place where you need some extra room on the stretcher.
customer_reviews.author: Lemhi

customer_reviews.title: Not what was seen on line
customer_reviews.text: VERY flimsy, would not hold up to extensive use (I have bunion issues) and would be using it a LOT! My Dad had a much better version for his shoes & I need to find THAT ONE! He has foot deformities & had to keep his shoes stretched. If you'll be using a shoe stretcher a lot & expect it to stretch specific spots on your shoes , do NOT get this item! The picture shown of this shoe stretcher is totally misleading!
customer_reviews.author: Puppylove

customer_reviews.title: Works well on leather shoes
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. I have size 13 feet so I ended up drilling a hole in the end of it and adding an old dresser door knob to stretch my shoes a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: titaniumbutt

customer_reviews.title: useless for boots
customer_reviews.text: looked up what would stretch boots and these came up. NO THEY WILL NOT stretch boots because they don't bend. might work great on shoes?????? Also, mine did not come w/any 4 Bunion/Corn Plugs. Can't return them because I've had them for 32 days and it is a 30 day policy.
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Use these on right size - iffy fit - shoes - spray the insides with recommended stretch agent - apply the women stretchers to desired point - 24 hours and voila - wonderful, comfortable pair of shoes. Good for shoes that are lightly worn and have been in the closet a while, or new shoes that need just a twitch of stretching here-and-there.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia H

customer_reviews.title: Does not open wide enough to really stretch your shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Does not open wide enough to really stretch your shoe from side to side enough. I dont get the non-matching sized black plastic Mr Potato Head bumps that come with it. There is only one of each shape, so you can't place one of the same size and shape on each side of it for a uniform stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma11

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Stretcher Actually Stretches Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely pleased with this ECOM Premium Professional 2-Way Shoe Stretcher. I used it on a pair of Thursday Boots dress shoes that were about 1/2 size too short and narrow small on one foot. After in both stretching in both directions for 36 hours, the shoes no longer pinched and even gave me some extra room inside. Now I can wear these dress shoes daily--something I could definitely not have done without this stretcher.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Gould

customer_reviews.title: 2 Way Show Stretcher - for Width
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as I wanted. Already stretched 2 pair (Width). Good price - shoe guy charged me $20 for one pair. It already paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: kdeelv

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The screws and bolts did not fit correctly, so they did not work properly. It's very simple to use and the idea is good, but if it's made sturdy, it's going to last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Helps wet shoes keep shape
customer_reviews.text: I have extra wide short feet 8 DDDD, hard to find shoes that fit well. Work in a kitchen and shoes get wet, even though they are waterproof, and tend to shrink up. These work great, come home and place them in shoes and when they dry the still fit well. Great solution to having sore toes.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID MCCONAHY

customer_reviews.title: Feet Like a Duck?
customer_reviews.text: This shoe stretcher helped stretch out my size 10 W boots to the size 10 EE size I really need.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Snyder

customer_reviews.title: One was good/ other one was Defective.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two. One works perfectly! Other does not. want to replace don’t want to go through the hassle and cost of a return for defective product. The hole on the defective one is two big and when tightened/in use the washer goes inside the hole which should not happen. Seller please help. Will rate 5 stars if seller can assist.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts detract from quality
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled with them. The metal washer is soft and bends like it is going to break.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm very glad I found this on Amazon. I had several pair of shoes, mostly sandals that I couldn't wear because one shoe was too tight even though they were wide fit. This shoe stretcher did the trick and now it's like having 3 new pair of shoes and I didn't have to try to return or give them away.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S Leader

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this less than 1 star I ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this less than 1 star I would. Very poorly made piece of junk. It fell apart first time I tried to use it. I ended up just throwing it away
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Stone

customer_reviews.title: hasn't made my boot bigger
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use and that extra piece on back I am not sure what its for, I am going to call the company for help, price was OK, shipping was pretty fast.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: received item quickly. very sturdy,,,does its job....has extra toe pieces,

customer_reviews.text: Could not get wide enough for my feet. And it only got wide at the tip/end. Decent workmanship though.

customer_reviews.title: Had several pair of nice shoes that would not break in to my feet
customer_reviews.text: Had several pair of nice shoes that would not break in to my feet. I can now wear both pairs all day and my feet do not hurt at the end of the day!

customer_reviews.text: Great value and works with my boots. I was a little hesitant because I needed it for a pair of new work boots and read from the reviews it was not good for boots but I was not disappointed.

customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful about this thing but it actually works. Stretched those new shoes out in a couple of days, and the seller was a fast and affordable shipper.

customer_reviews.text: Great price ~ Good quality ~ Quick delivery ~ Works perfectly

customer_reviews.title: I will keep this unit for my wives small narrow shoes but I would like a stretcher for my shoes
customer_reviews.text: The unit received only fits narrow womens shoe(2-Wa,,n (single Large 9-13). I need a unit that fits mens 9-13 and can stretch width. Did I get the wrong product? I will keep this unit for my wives small narrow shoes but I would like a stretcher for my shoes. Please advise if one is available as I will order it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for as long as it works but after a few months it falls apart and stops screwing back together. Return window has closed of course. I just got finished ordering a new kind. It is worth spending a bit more money rather than paying twice.
customer_reviews.author: Rlinc

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to be of good quality until you attempt to use it. The knob you turn to stretch the shoe is so poorly fitted to the screw it is near impossible to turn, thereby rendering the shoe stretcher useless. No amount of WD40 has helped, nor any other type lubricant. Absolutely no quality control on this product. Save your money .
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Unsuccessful for stretching my shoes so far
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. The stretcher does not stay in position and creeps as the tension is increased. May not work on some shoe shapes. Failed on my sandals and cave boots. My arborist boots need stretching and I have not yet tried the stretcher on them,. I will be very happy if that boot stretches.
customer_reviews.author: L. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use didn't come with any of the bunion, corn bumps that you see in the picture. Mainly stretches the forefoot area. Not a lot of strecth in the arch area. I had to position it up in the shoe to get some stretch in the arch area of the shoes, & it did enough to make them wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Rhapsody

customer_reviews.title: should be size 6 to 9
customer_reviews.text: works great on a tiny shoe but is usless on anything above size 11 and i have a size 13 wide and the only way i can get it to work is cut a garden hose up and put it in the side of the shoe and then stritch and it works then dont get me wrong small shoe excellent big shoe save your money
customer_reviews.author: toy couple

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have a bone spur at the base joint of my big toe. Shoes that fit perfectly otherwise rub over that joint. This device works just like its should . It has little plastic bumps that you can put in where you need more room. I’m careful with it because I don’t want to overstress it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bush

customer_reviews.title: It works, but is cheap made.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, but does what I bought it to do. Slightly widened and slightly lengthened a pair of shoes. Don't go ape on it all at once, you want to stretch your shoes incrementally. Installing the shoe stretcher, and then placing the shoes in the warm sun helps! The sun will warm and soften the shoe mateiral allowing it to stretch easier.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: One was definitely enough
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to stretch some shoes which were not wide enough for my recently appeared tailor's bunion. Unfortunately, the mechanism to widen the ball of the foot doesn't work very well - it doesn't widen evenly - and the small bumps are not really big enough to make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders on tight New shoes
customer_reviews.text: highly recommend this product. Would have probably returned at least 3 pairs of shoes . This works wonders . Made New shoes comfortable right away. Didn't have to break them in. Worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Kibbe

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works! Also got spray on shoe stretcher so sprayed and then put in the contraption. Saved my heels where the shoe came narrow at the back of the heel maybe from those sticks to keep the shoe nice in the box—no more blood. I’ve used it this far on pointy shoes and shoes where heel was rubbing. Works great. Be patience and keep on for a couple days gradually expanding.
customer_reviews.author: H Adler

customer_reviews.title: Ruined in two uses
customer_reviews.text: At first glance this appears to be a well made product. The one I received began to come apart during its second use. The parts are made of very cheap materials. The wood is like balsa wood, the washer bit into the wood like a screw. Larger washer and harder wood are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Diver43

customer_reviews.title: 1 not a pair.
customer_reviews.text: Read the discription carefully. This is only 1 not a pair. It works well but i clearly did not read well enough to see that it was only one so it made the ability to use my new shoes take longer. My fault really.
customer_reviews.author: kari scott

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased two. About to order another one. What's the point in only have one. Alternating from shoe to shoe just seems silly to me. These should be sold in pairs.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this product would maybe work on very narrow shoes, but for my average width shoes it did absolutely nothing as far as stretching the toe box of my shoes. I am returning.

product_meta.title: Ecom City Premium Professional 2-Way Wooden Shoe Stretcher for Women and Men (Single Large 9-13 Size)

Available in 3 sizes can be used for men and women, Can Be Used for Right & Left Shoes
